bibl.title: Two Archives from the Roman Arsinoites.
bibl.note: Two archives: the first contains the correspondence of Apollonios, an estate manager in Bakchias in the period of the Flavii (16 texts); the second deals with the files of Hatres and Isas, two éllÒfuloi leasing fields in Philadelpheia, A.D. 276-314 (8 texts). <allophuloi>
SMOLDERS Ruben, Two Archives from the Roman Arsinoites.
